verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God of Mercy and compassion,you have given us the gift of our Country Kenya and the gift of citizenship.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As Kenyans and people of good will,you have entrusted the responsibility to build and improve our Country so that all may live in dignity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: As we work we implore you to fill us with gifts of the holy spirit and values of the gospel;especially during the forthcoming general elections.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: During this year of elections,bless all people of Kenya that they may take their social responsibility to register to vote,to pray,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: to study the issues and the candidates and then vote in good consciences without fear,intimidation or favour.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: May our choice in the coming general elections take into account the poor,vulnerable and the common good of our Country.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: We pray for our elected leaders so that in wisdom and prudence that may make decisions that are just and true to the spirit of the Constitution.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: We pray for our current and future leaders to work for the common good and prosperity of our Country that justice shall be our shield and defender.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
We ask this through Jesus Christ our Lord.
Amen
